item.title: Tennis star meets fan after US Open hat snatching viral video
item.description: Kamil Majchrzak shared a clip of him meeting the boy, after a viral video appeared to show a spectator depriving him of one.

item.title: Indonesian politicians to have perks cut in bid to quell unrest
item.description: The move aims to subdue anti-government demonstrations that have swept across the country.

item.title: Australian state to ban iconic fish-shaped soy sauce bottles
item.description: The plastic containers have become a staple in many Asian restaurants and takeaways around the world.

item.title: Head-on crash between police van and prison bus kills 14 in Namibia
item.description: Eleven members of the prison service and a police officer were among the fatalities.

item.title: Putin, Modi and other world leaders in China for summit
item.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin and Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi are among the 20 world leaders attending a regional security summit in China.
